import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import '../../styles/order.css' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; export default function Order() { const [recieve, setRecieve] = useState(true); const [send, setSend] = useState(false); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(''); const [interest, setInterest] = useState(''); const ServiceRef=useRef() const handleRecieve = () => { setSend(true) setRecieve(false) } const PhoneRefElem=(e)=>{ console.log(e.target.value) setPhone(e.target.value) if (e.target.value.length===13){ ServiceRef.current.focus() } } const handleSend = () => { if(name===''){ document.getElementById('name').classList.toggle('is-invalid'); } else{ document.getElementById('name').classList.remove('is-invalid'); } if(phone==='' && phone.length<13){ document.getElementById('phone').classList.toggle('is-invalid'); } else{ } if(interest===''){ document.getElementById('service').classList.toggle('is-invalid'); } if(name && phone && interest){ setSend(false) setRecieve(false) toast.success("🌟🤩🌟🥳🌟 Oтправлено !!! "); } } return (
